= Introduction =

It is a simple solution on Google Appengine which can proxy the HTTP request to twitter's official REST API url . 

= Details =
  * 修改app.yaml，将“your_application_id”替换为你的GAE应用的名字
  * 将代码上传至google app engine
  * 访问你的GAE应用，点击“Sign in with twitter”的图标，完成授权
  * 记住授权完毕后的key，或者自己修改成一个易记的。
  * Now you can use gtap with funny
